title: LWC插件的各种报错警告刷屏
author: 廖美玲
txt_content:
这是最常见的几个问题，该怎么解决。
[00:04:22 INFO]: [LWC] The exact location of the block is not possible to obtain. This is caused by a Minecraft or Bukkit exception normally.
[00:04:22 WARN]: java.lang.ClassCastException: net.minecraftforge.cauldron.block.CraftCustomContainer cannot be cast to org.bukkit.block.Chest

replies.author: Jecvay
replies.txt_content: 升级到最新版试试，暂时无解

replies.author: Flowers_花花
replies.txt_content: LWC和很多插件都冲突 可以试试升级版本或者无视报错

replies.author: 十年后？
replies.txt_content: 要是能正常运行 其实这个问题并无大碍 可以尝试重载LWC配置或者升级一下LWC插件

replies.author: Jasumin
replies.txt_content: 这个报错不要紧的，可以重新载入插件或者换个插件版本
